items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- The tapered cut is slightly roomy at the thighs and slim at the hems.
- Zippered fly.
- Raw indigo denim is prone to color transfer, so we recommend washing these jeans on their own.
items.name: MEN Selvedge Regular Fit Jeans
items.shortDescription: Genuine selvedge denim with a sturdy feel and red ear piping.

items.longDescription:
- Incredibly quick-drying DRY-EX fabric.
- Cotton-like, casual look.
items.name: MEN Dry-EX Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Our quick-drying T-shirt keeps you feeling fresh. Cotton-look fabric for a casual style.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material dries sweat and moisture incredibly quickly. We’ve added anti-microbial and anti-odor properties to keep you feeling fresh even in sweaty situations.
- We performed a data analysis of indigo dyeing and mudding, which are Japanese traditional crafts, and faithfully reproduced the color for the print.
- A gusset under the sleeve makes for easier movement in every direction.
- Silhouette that is easy to wear not only for sports but also for casual situations.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX Printed Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Incredibly quick-drying, smooth, and feels fresh. The perfect fit for every situation with carefully selected coloring.

items.longDescription:
- With Cool Touch, absorbent, quick-drying, and moisture-wicking functions.
- Versatile design in basic colors.
items.name: AIRism Bedsheet (Queen)
items.shortDescription: For a cool, comfortable night’s sleep.
items.washingInformation:
Machine wash cold, gentle cycle
Do not tumble dry

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material quickly dries sweat and moisture.
- Refined fabrics and a clean silhouette make this shirt a good choice.
- The hem is narrow, so it's roomy, but it's also comfortable, and is great for an active lifestyle.
- It's finished with elastic around the waist and snap buttons at the front for a laid-back look and flat-knit comfort.
items.name: EZY Jogger Trousers
items.shortDescription: It looks neat and clean. High-performance fabric and an uneven hem for a sporty look.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material quickly dries sweat and moisture.
- This season's updated design features adding extra space at the inseam for a comfortable, tapered fit.
- Refined fabrics and a clean ankle-length cut make this a perfect choice.
- The waist has snap buttons and elastic on the inside for an easy feel and a flat design.
items.name: MEN EZY Ankle Trousers (Extra stretch DRY-EX)
items.shortDescription: It looks neat and clean. Enhanced the materials and cut for added comfort.

items.longDescription:
- Layers well.
- Just the right amount of softness for a laid-back feel.
items.name: Linen Cotton Stand Collar Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: We adjusted the shoulder, chest, and hem for a more modern and loose fit.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made with soft polyester-rayon flannel fabric.
- The slightly brushed surface creates an extra warm look.
- The boxy oversized cut means it also styles as an outer layer.
- A brushed checked shirt with a vintage style.
items.name: MEN Heavy Flannel Oversized Checked Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: A soft flannel shirt with a brushed feel. Also styles as an outer layer.

items.longDescription:
- Made with Ultra Stretch fabric.
- With DRY technology.
- Amazing stretch and a light feel for complete comfort.
- Exceptional stretch accommodates any kind of movement.
- Crisp fabric traps a layer of air to maintain a comfortable temperature.
- Relaxed cut.
- Raglan sleeves for ease of movement.
- Details include a secure zip pocket and a zipper pull for easy access.
- Ideal for sports or everyday wear.
items.name: Ultra Stretch Dry Sweatshirt
items.shortDescription: Incredible stretch for freedom of movement. So comfortable you’ll forget you’re wearing it.

items.longDescription:
- With Cool Touch, absorbent, quick-drying, and moisture-wicking functions.
- Versatile design in basic colors.
- Now available in even more sizes!
items.name: AIRism Duvet Cover (Queen)
items.shortDescription: For a cool, comfortable night’s sleep.

Machine wash cold, gentle cycle
Do not tumble dry

items.composition: Body: 56% Acrylic, 39% Polyester, 5% Wool/ Trim: 100% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- A cardigan made with flannel-like wool blend fleece fabric.
- Military-inspired details including piping and woven placket backing.
- Perfectly designed for storage with exterior pockets plus an inside patch pocket.
- Versatile outerwear that’s also great for layering.
- The Uniqlo U mélange color makes this an instant star of your wardrobe.
items.name: MEN Fleece Cardigan
items.shortDescription: Carefully selected fabrics, design, and details. A superb combination of style and practicality.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made from 19.5 micron extra fine Merino wool blended with acrylic for warmth and softness.
- Added nylon yarns help the knit retain its shape.
- Fisherman’s rib knit made with a mid-gauge Merino wool blend.
- Drop shoulder design is great for layering.
- Thumb hole at the cuffs.
items.name: MEN Merino Blend Full-Zip Long Sleeve Sweater
items.shortDescription: This mid-gauge full-zip sweater is perfect for layering. With thumb holes for extra protection against the cold.

items.composition: Face: 100% Nylon/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Nylon
items.longDescription:
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Pocketable design.
- Anti-static lining.
- Resin-coated lining.
- Fill power of over 640.
- Storage pouch matches the pocket fabric. *Slight color difference from the outer fabric.
items.name: MEN Ultra Light Down Wave Quilt Jacket
items.shortDescription: Thin, light, and warm. Quilted lines add a stylish design accent.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Nylon, (40% Nylon, Reclaimedfrommanufacturing)filling: Body: 85% Recycleddown, 15% Recycledfeathers/ Pocket: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Nylon, (43% Nylon, Reclaimedfrommanufacturing)rib: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made from 50% nylon recycled from UNIQLO down products donated by customers and staff.
- Sustainable design.
- Features a fitted cut and meticulous attention to detail.
- A versatile, unisex layering piece.
- Updated shoulder design.
- Developed with recycled down as part of our sustainability efforts.
items.name: MEN Recycled Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: An eco-conscious cardigan made using recycled down. Perfect for layering.

items.composition: Face: 100% Nylon [Filling] Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers [Shoulder] Inner Layer: 90% Down, 10% Feathers [Shoulder] Outer Layer: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Nylon
items.longDescription:
- Pocketable design that is compact in size and can be carried around.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Uses a special inner-lining to prevent static electricity.
- This season’s updates includes a wider quilt for a more casual look.
- In response to customer feedback, we changed the size to make it look neat and not too tight.
- The collar stands up firmly and looks sharp.
- Three-dimensional gusset under the armpit makes it easy to move your arms.
- In a stylish matte finish.
items.name: MEN Ultra Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: A thin, light, and warm down jacket. Attention has been paid to the design and comfort of each part.

items.composition: Face: 100% Polyamide/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Polyamide
items.longDescription:
- Our first collaboration with White Mountaineering explores new possibilities in outerwear and fleece.

- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Pocketable design.
- UNIQLO original Ultra Light Down in a relaxed, voluminous cut matches the collaboration’s concept of “the outdoors in everyday life”.
- 3D cut designed for easy movement.
- Unisex design.
- Big Ripstop shell for a more stylish design.
- Ultra Light Down with multiple pockets for excellent storage.
- Cardigan design works great as a middle layer.
items.name: MEN WM Ultra Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: The material, fit, and cut are carefully selected for improved feel, practicality, and style. *Purchase Limit : 2 pieces per item per person

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: Front Body: Back Body: From The Waist Up: Top Sleeve: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back Body: From The Waist Down: Back Body: Yoke: Shoulder: Under Sleeve: Sides of The Item: Pocket: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Hood: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
- Our first collaboration with White Mountaineering explores new possibilities in outerwear and fleece.

- Only one part is made with absorbent bio-warming padding.
- The relaxed, voluminous cut matches the collaboration’s concept of “the outdoors in everyday life”.
- Features UNIQLO's unique hybrid design.
- Contoured 3D cut designed for easy movement.
- Excellent storage capability, with a total of six pockets as well as a handwarmer.
- Shape-memory fabric with a subtle glossy sheen, great for wearing out and about.
items.name: MEN WM Hybrid Down Parka
items.shortDescription: The cut, design, and textures used to create the concept combine superb function and style. *Purchase Limit : 2 pieces per item per person
